mapper.sql: id, interface_name, interface_title, interface_address, interface_status, interface_explanation, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id, interface_res_id
mapper.insert:
insert into service_interface_base_info (id, interface_name, interface_title, interface_address, interface_status, interface_explanation, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id, interface_res_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceExplanation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.interfaceResId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete:
delete from service_interface_base_info where id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, interface_name AS interfaceName, interface_title AS interfaceTitle, interface_title AS interfaceAddress, interface_status AS interfaceStatus FROM service_interface_base_info
POSITION(#{serviceInterfaceDocumentDTO.keyWords} IN interface_name) > 0

SELECT id, interface_name AS interfaceName, interface_title AS interfaceTitle, interface_title AS interfaceAddress, interface_status AS interfaceStatus, interface_explanation AS interfaceExplanation, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate FROM service_interface_base_info WHERE id = #{id}
